HiddenText.Name: How can I get Academic Support assistance?
HiddenText.OpenningText: How can I get Academic Support assistance?
HiddenText.BodyCopy:
Your instructor can be a great resource if you have questions about specific assignments, but we have multiple resources available to help you with other Academic Support needs.
If you need additional help understanding content, you may want to take advantage of tutoring resources by visiting: http://www.byui.edu/tutoringcenter/
Then click on "Online Tutoring" for step-by-step information about how to request a tutor.
If you need writing assistance, please contact the Writing Center's and review their online options: http://www.byui.edu/WritingCenter/
Then click on "Online Support" for more information.
If you think you may have enrolled in too many classes, contact your advising center to talk through your options.
